User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the LexFlow Workspace system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

googleId.description: The Google ID of the user, obtained during Google OAuth authentication.

email.description: The email address of the user.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

role.description: The role of the user (e.g., admin, lawyer, financial, assistant).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the user was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the user was last updated.

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client in the LexFlow Workspace system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the client entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the client.

lastName.description: The last name of the client.

document.description: The client's identification document (e.g., CPF, CNPJ).

avatar.description: The URL of the client's avatar.

legalArea.description: The legal area of the case associated with the client.

driveFolderId.description: The ID of the client's folder in Google Drive.

sheetId.description: The ID of the client's Google Sheet.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the client was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the client was last updated.

Process.title: Process
Process.description: Represents a legal process in the LexFlow Workspace system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the process entity.

clientId.description: Reference to the primary client associated with the process.

name.description: The title or internal name for the process, for easy identification.

processNumber.description: The official number of the legal process, if distributed.

court.description: The court where the process is being handled (e.g., 'TRT-2').

courtBranch.description: The specific branch or division of the court (Vara).

caseValue.description: The monetary value of the case.

opposingParties.description: A list of names of the opposing parties (people or companies).

description.description: Detailed notes and observations about the process.

responsibleStaffIds.description: A list of staff IDs responsible for the process.

driveFolderId.description: The ID of the process's subfolder in Google Drive.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the process was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the process was last updated.

Reimbursement.title: Reimbursement
Reimbursement.description: Represents a reimbursement request from a staff member.

userId.description: ID of the user who requested.

userName.description: Name of the user for display.
